scheme_name: Post-Matric Scholarship for Scheduled Castes (SC) and Scheduled Tribes (ST) Students-Bihar
details: The “Post-Matric Scholarship for Scheduled Castes (SC) and Scheduled Tribes (ST) Students-Bihar” is designed to support students from disadvantaged communities by covering their educational expenses for post-secondary courses. The scholarship is intended for students belonging to Schedule Castes (SC) and Scheduled Tribes (ST). This initiative promotes access to higher education and helps reduce the financial burden on families from these communities.
benefits: Scholarship and maintenance allowance will be payable on the basis of the criteria prescribed in the resolution issued by the Government of India from time to time.
eligibility: The applicant should be a permanent resident of Bihar state.
The caste of the applicant should be included in the list of Scheduled Castes (SC) and Scheduled Tribes (ST) issued by the state government.
The applicant should be studying in higher classes after passing the Matriculation/Entry Examination.
The family’s annual income must not exceed ₹3,00,000/-.
exclusions: After passing one level course, studying in another equivalent course will not be entitled to scholarship, for example, after passing I.S.C. examination, studying in I.A., after passing B.A. examination, studying in B.Com. and after doing M.Sc., studying in M.A. class will not be given scholarship.
application_process: Registration: Visit the official Post-Matric Scholarship Portal and follow the registration process.
Login: Visit the official Post-Matric Scholarship Portal, log in using the required credentials, and submit the application.
documents_required: Admission letter and fee receipt from the educational institution.
